skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a seasoned backend developer, I bring extensive expertise in Java, Python, and C#, coupled with proficiency in frameworks like Spring Boot. My skill set encompasses Object-Oriented Programming, UML Modeling, and Concurrency & Multithreading, machine learning(NLP), reflecting a strong foundation in software architecture and efficient parallel processing. I've efficiently utilized continuous integration tools such as TeamCity and Github actions as CI/CD tools CI/CD. Using github actions and TeamCity, I've streamlined the integration and delivery processes, ensuring a smooth and automated workflow for building, testing, and deploying backend applications.

skills.title: Cloud Services
skills.description: I have extensive experience in cloud services, particularly in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Amazon Web Services (AWS). In GCP, I've successfully utilized services such as Pub/Sub, Cloud Composer, Dataflow Jobs, Compute Engine, Cloud Storage Bucket, BigQuery, Bigtable, and Datastore. This demonstrates my proficiency in building scalable and reliable solutions using a variety of GCP tools. On the AWS front, I've leveraged Lambda functions for serverless computing, orchestrated workflows with Step Functions,EC2, S3, SNS & SQS, CloudFront.

skills.title: Database
skills.description: My expertise extends to relational databases, including MySQL, SQL Server, and Oracle, where I've effectively designed and managed structured data models, ensuring data integrity and optimal performance.On the NoSQL front, I have hands-on experience with MongoDB, handling document-based data models, and DynamoDB, a managed NoSQL service by AWS, showcasing my ability to work with highly scalable and flexible non-relational databases.Moreover, I've worked with key-value stores, particularly Bigtable, which is well-suited for large-scale database requirement

portfolio.title: Publications
portfolio.description: As a dedicated researcher in machine learning, my portfolio reflects a profound focus on leveraging advanced techniques to solve complex problems in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and sentiment analysis. With a recent publication in a reputable journal, my work underscores a commitment to innovation and excellence in the field.

portfolio.title: Projects and Industry experience
portfolio.description: My expertise lies in leveraging the power of Google Cloud services and employing distributed processing techniques using Java and Python. I have successfully contributed to various projects, demonstrating proficiency in optimizing system performance and scalability. In addition to my professional endeavors, I am passionate about personal projects that showcase my creativity and technical prowess. see my github below

portfolio.title: academic qualifications

Subsequently, I earned a Master's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from a renowned university in South Korea. Additionally, I attained a second Master's degree in Computer Science from MIU here  in the USA. I also was  actively engaged in research, focusing on machine learning with a primary emphasis on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Sequence Models.See my linkedin below
